60 TrainerSpell const* TrainerSpellData::Find(uint32 spell_id) const
61 {
62  TrainerSpellMap::const_iterator itr = spellList.find(spell_id);
63  if (itr != spellList.end())
64  return &itr->second;
65 
66  return nullptr;
67 }

69 bool VendorItemData::RemoveItem(uint32 item_id)
70 {
71  bool found = false;
72  for (VendorItemList::iterator i = m_items.begin(); i != m_items.end();)
73  {
74  if ((*i)->item == item_id)
75  {
76  i = m_items.erase(i++);
77  found = true;
78  }
79  else
80  ++i;
81  }
82  return found;
83 }

85 VendorItem const* VendorItemData::FindItemCostPair(uint32 item_id, uint32 extendedCost) const
86 {
87  for (VendorItemList::const_iterator i = m_items.begin(); i != m_items.end(); ++i)
88  if ((*i)->item == item_id && (*i)->ExtendedCost == extendedCost)
89  return *i;
90  return nullptr;
91 }

93 uint32 CreatureTemplate::GetRandomValidModelId() const
94 {
95  uint8 c = 0;
96  uint32 modelIDs[4];
97 
98  if (Modelid1) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid1;
99  if (Modelid2) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid2;
100  if (Modelid3) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid3;
101  if (Modelid4) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid4;
102 
103  return ((c > 0) ? modelIDs[urand(0, c - 1)] : 0);
104 }

106 uint32 CreatureTemplate::GetFirstValidModelId() const
107 {
108  if (Modelid1) return Modelid1;
109  if (Modelid2) return Modelid2;
110  if (Modelid3) return Modelid3;
111  if (Modelid4) return Modelid4;
112  return 0;
113 }

115 void CreatureTemplate::InitializeQueryData()
116 {
117  queryData.Initialize(SMSG_CREATURE_QUERY_RESPONSE, 1);
118 
119  queryData << uint32(Entry); // creature entry
120  queryData << Name;
121  queryData << uint8(0) << uint8(0) << uint8(0); // name2, name3, name4, always empty
122  queryData << SubName;
123  queryData << IconName; // "Directions" for guard, string for Icons 2.3.0
124  queryData << uint32(type_flags); // flags
125  queryData << uint32(type); // CreatureType.dbc
126  queryData << uint32(family); // CreatureFamily.dbc
127  queryData << uint32(rank); // Creature Rank (elite, boss, etc)
128  queryData << uint32(KillCredit[0]); // new in 3.1, kill credit
129  queryData << uint32(KillCredit[1]); // new in 3.1, kill credit
130  queryData << uint32(Modelid1); // Modelid1
131  queryData << uint32(Modelid2); // Modelid2
132  queryData << uint32(Modelid3); // Modelid3
133  queryData << uint32(Modelid4); // Modelid4
134  queryData << float(ModHealth); // dmg/hp modifier
135  queryData << float(ModMana); // dmg/mana modifier
136  queryData << uint8(RacialLeader);
137  queryData << uint32(movementId); // CreatureMovementInfo.dbc
138 }

140 bool AssistDelayEvent::Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/)
141 {
142  if (Unit* victim = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_owner, m_victim))
143  {
144  // Initialize last damage timer if it doesn't exist
145  m_owner->SetLastDamagedTime(sWorld->GetGameTime() + MAX_AGGRO_RESET_TIME);
146 
147  while (!m_assistants.empty())
148  {
149  Creature* assistant = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*m_owner, *m_assistants.begin());
150  m_assistants.pop_front();
151 
152  if (assistant && assistant->CanAssistTo(m_owner, victim))
153  {
154  assistant->SetNoCallAssistance(true);
155  assistant->CombatStart(victim);
156  if (assistant->IsAIEnabled)
157  assistant->AI()->AttackStart(victim);
158 
159  assistant->SetLastDamagedTimePtr(m_owner->GetLastDamagedTimePtr());
160  }
161  }
162  }
163  return true;
164 }

216 void Creature::AddToWorld()
217 {
219  if (!IsInWorld())
220  {
221  // pussywizard: motion master needs to be initialized before OnCreatureCreate, which may set death state to JUST_DIED, to prevent crash
222  // it's also initialized in AIM_Initialize(), few lines below, but it's not a problem
223  Motion_Initialize();
224 
225  GetMap()->GetObjectsStore().Insert<Creature>(GetGUID(), this);
226  if (m_spawnId)
227  {
228  GetMap()->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().insert(std::make_pair(m_spawnId, this));
229  }
230  Unit::AddToWorld();
231 
232  SearchFormation();
233 
234  AIM_Initialize();
235 
236  if (IsVehicle())
237  {
238  GetVehicleKit()->Install();
239  }
240 
241  if (GetZoneScript())
242  {
243  GetZoneScript()->OnCreatureCreate(this);
244  }
245 #ifdef ELUNA
246  sEluna->OnAddToWorld(this);
247 
248  if (IsGuardian() && ToTempSummon() && ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerGUID().IsPlayer())
249  sEluna->OnPetAddedToWorld(ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit()->ToPlayer(), this);
250 #endif
251  }
252 }
253 
254 void Creature::RemoveFromWorld()
255 {
256  if (IsInWorld())
257  {
258 #ifdef ELUNA
259  sEluna->OnRemoveFromWorld(this);
260 #endif
261  if (GetZoneScript())
262  GetZoneScript()->OnCreatureRemove(this);
263 
264  if (m_formation)
265  sFormationMgr->RemoveCreatureFromGroup(m_formation, this);
266 
267  if (Transport* transport = GetTransport())
268  transport->RemovePassenger(this, true);
269 
270  Unit::RemoveFromWorld();
271 
272  if (m_spawnId)
273  Acore::Containers::MultimapErasePair(GetMap()->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore(), m_spawnId, this);
274 
275  GetMap()->GetObjectsStore().Remove<Creature>(GetGUID());
276  }
277 }

289 void Creature::SearchFormation()
290 {
291  if (IsSummon())
292  {
293  return;
294  }
295 
296  ObjectGuid::LowType spawnId = GetSpawnId();
297  if (!spawnId)
298  {
299  return;
300  }
301 
302  CreatureGroupInfoType::const_iterator frmdata = sFormationMgr->CreatureGroupMap.find(spawnId);
303  if (frmdata != sFormationMgr->CreatureGroupMap.end())
304  {
305  sFormationMgr->AddCreatureToGroup(frmdata->second.leaderGUID, this);
306  }
307 }

309 void Creature::RemoveCorpse(bool setSpawnTime, bool skipVisibility)
310 {
311  if (getDeathState() != CORPSE)
312  return;
313 
314  m_corpseRemoveTime = time(nullptr);
315  setDeathState(DEAD);
316  RemoveAllAuras();
317  if (!skipVisibility) // pussywizard
318  DestroyForNearbyPlayers(); // pussywizard: previous UpdateObjectVisibility()
319  loot.clear();
320  uint32 respawnDelay = m_respawnDelay;
321  if (IsAIEnabled)
322  AI()->CorpseRemoved(respawnDelay);
323 
324  // Should get removed later, just keep "compatibility" with scripts
325  if (setSpawnTime)
326  {
327  m_respawnTime = time(nullptr) + respawnDelay;
328  //SaveRespawnTime();
329  }
330 
331  float x, y, z, o;
332  GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
333  SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
334  SetPosition(x, y, z, o);
335 
336  // xinef: relocate notifier
337  m_last_notify_position.Relocate(-5000.0f, -5000.0f, -5000.0f, 0.0f);
338 
339  // pussywizard: if corpse was removed during falling then the falling will continue after respawn, so stop falling is such case
340  if (IsFalling())
341  StopMoving();
342 }

347 bool Creature::InitEntry(uint32 Entry, const CreatureData* data)
348 {
349  CreatureTemplate const* normalInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
350  if (!normalInfo)
351  {
352  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::InitEntry creature entry %u does not exist.", Entry);
353  return false;
354  }
355 
356  // get difficulty 1 mode entry
357  // Xinef: Skip for pets!
358  CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = normalInfo;
359  for (uint8 diff = uint8(GetMap()->GetSpawnMode()); diff > 0 && !IsPet();)
360  {
361  // we already have valid Map pointer for current creature!
362  if (normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1])
363  {
364  cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1]);
365  if (cinfo)
366  break; // template found
367 
368  // check and reported at startup, so just ignore (restore normalInfo)
369  cinfo = normalInfo;
370  }
371 
372  // for instances heroic to normal, other cases attempt to retrieve previous difficulty
373  if (diff >= RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_HEROIC && GetMap()->IsRaid())
374  diff -= 2; // to normal raid difficulty cases
375  else
376  --diff;
377  }
378 
379  SetEntry(Entry); // normal entry always
380  m_creatureInfo = cinfo; // map mode related always
381 
382  // equal to player Race field, but creature does not have race
383  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 0, 0);
384 
385  // known valid are: CLASS_WARRIOR, CLASS_PALADIN, CLASS_ROGUE, CLASS_MAGE
386  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 1, uint8(cinfo->unit_class));
387 
388  // Cancel load if no model defined
389  if (!(cinfo->GetFirstValidModelId()))
390  {
391  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (Entry: %u) has no model defined in table `creature_template`, can't load. ", Entry);
392  return false;
393  }
394 
395  uint32 displayID = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(GetCreatureTemplate(), data);
396  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID);
397  if (!minfo) // Cancel load if no model defined
398  {
399  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (Entry: %u) has no model defined in table `creature_template`, can't load. ", Entry);
400  return false;
401  }
402 
403  SetDisplayId(displayID);
404  SetNativeDisplayId(displayID);
405  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 2, minfo->gender);
406 
407  // Load creature equipment
408  if (!data || data->equipmentId == 0) // use default from the template
409  LoadEquipment();
410  else
411  {
412  m_originalEquipmentId = data->equipmentId;
413  LoadEquipment(data->equipmentId);
414  }
415 
416  SetName(normalInfo->Name); // at normal entry always
417 
418  SetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED, 1.0f);
419 
420  SetSpeed(MOVE_WALK, cinfo->speed_walk);
421  SetSpeed(MOVE_RUN, cinfo->speed_run);
422  SetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, 1.0f); // using 1.0 rate
423  SetSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, 1.0f); // using 1.0 rate
424 
425  // Will set UNIT_FIELD_BOUNDINGRADIUS and UNIT_FIELD_COMBATREACH
426  SetObjectScale(cinfo->scale);
427 
428  SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_HOVERHEIGHT, cinfo->HoverHeight);
429 
430  // checked at loading
431  m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(cinfo->MovementType);
432  if (!m_wanderDistance && m_defaultMovementType == RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE)
433  m_defaultMovementType = IDLE_MOTION_TYPE;
434 
435  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
436  m_spells[i] = GetCreatureTemplate()->spells[i];
437 
438  return true;
439 }
440 
441 bool Creature::UpdateEntry(uint32 Entry, const CreatureData* data, bool changelevel)
442 {
443  if (!InitEntry(Entry, data))
444  return false;
445 
446  CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
447 
448  m_regenHealth = cInfo->RegenHealth;
449 
450  // creatures always have melee weapon ready if any unless specified otherwise
451  if (!GetCreatureAddon())
452  SetSheath(SHEATH_STATE_MELEE);
453 
454  SetFaction(cInfo->faction);
455 
456  uint32 npcflag, unit_flags, dynamicflags;
457  ObjectMgr::ChooseCreatureFlags(cInfo, npcflag, unit_flags, dynamicflags, data);
458 
459  if (cInfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_WORLDEVENT)
460  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, npcflag | sGameEventMgr->GetNPCFlag(this));
461  else
462  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, npcflag);
463 
464  // Xinef: NPC is in combat, keep this flag!
465  unit_flags &= ~UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT;
466  if (IsInCombat())
467  unit_flags |= UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT;
468 
469  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, unit_flags);
470  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, cInfo->unit_flags2);
471 
472  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, dynamicflags);
473 
474  SetAttackTime(BASE_ATTACK, cInfo->BaseAttackTime);
475  SetAttackTime(OFF_ATTACK, cInfo->BaseAttackTime);
476  SetAttackTime(RANGED_ATTACK, cInfo->RangeAttackTime);
477 
478  uint32 previousHealth = GetHealth();
479  uint32 previousMaxHealth = GetMaxHealth();
480  uint32 previousPlayerDamageReq = m_PlayerDamageReq;
481 
482  SelectLevel(changelevel);
483  if (previousHealth > 0)
484  {
485  SetHealth(previousHealth);
486 
487  if (previousMaxHealth && previousMaxHealth > GetMaxHealth())
488  {
489  m_PlayerDamageReq = (uint32)(previousPlayerDamageReq * GetMaxHealth() / previousMaxHealth);
490  }
491  else
492  {
493  m_PlayerDamageReq = previousPlayerDamageReq;
494  }
495  }
496 
497  SetMeleeDamageSchool(SpellSchools(cInfo->dmgschool));
498  CreatureBaseStats const* stats = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureBaseStats(getLevel(), cInfo->unit_class);
499  float armor = (float)stats->GenerateArmor(cInfo); // TODO: Why is this treated as uint32 when it's a float?
500  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_ARMOR, BASE_VALUE, armor);
501  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_HOLY, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_HOLY]));
502  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FIRE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_FIRE]));
503  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_NATURE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_NATURE]));
504  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FROST, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_FROST]));
505  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_SHADOW, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_SHADOW]));
506  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE]));
507 
508  SetCanModifyStats(true);
509  UpdateAllStats();
510 
511  // checked and error show at loading templates
512  if (FactionTemplateEntry const* factionTemplate = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->faction))
513  {
514  if (factionTemplate->factionFlags & FACTION_TEMPLATE_FLAG_ASSIST_PLAYERS)
515  SetPvP(true);
516  else
517  SetPvP(false);
518  }
519 
520  // updates spell bars for vehicles and set player's faction - should be called here, to overwrite faction that is set from the new template
521  if (IsVehicle())
522  {
523  if (Player* owner = Creature::GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself()) // this check comes in case we don't have a player
524  {
525  SetFaction(owner->GetFaction()); // vehicles should have same as owner faction
526  owner->VehicleSpellInitialize();
527  }
528  }
529 
530  // trigger creature is always not selectable and can not be attacked
531  if (IsTrigger())
532  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE);
533 
534  InitializeReactState();
535 
536  if (!IsPet() && cInfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_TAUNT)
537  {
538  ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_STATE, SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT, true);
539  ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_ATTACK_ME, true);
540  }
541 
542  if (cInfo->InhabitType & INHABIT_ROOT)
543  {
544  SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
545  }
546 
547  SetDetectionDistance(cInfo->detection_range);
548 
549  LoadSpellTemplateImmunity();
550  return true;
551 }
552 
553 void Creature::Update(uint32 diff)
554 {
555  if (IsAIEnabled && TriggerJustRespawned)
556  {
557  TriggerJustRespawned = false;
558  AI()->JustRespawned();
559  if (m_vehicleKit)
560  m_vehicleKit->Reset();
561  }
562 
563  switch (m_deathState)
564  {
565  case JUST_RESPAWNED:
566  // Must not be called, see Creature::setDeathState JUST_RESPAWNED -> ALIVE promoting.
567  LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature (%s) in wrong state: JUST_RESPAWNED (4)", GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
568  break;
569  case JUST_DIED:
570  // Must not be called, see Creature::setDeathState JUST_DIED -> CORPSE promoting.
571  LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature (%s) in wrong state: JUST_DEAD (1)", GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
572  break;
573  case DEAD:
574  {
575  time_t now = time(nullptr);
576  if (m_respawnTime <= now)
577  {
578  bool allowed = !IsAIEnabled || AI()->CanRespawn(); // First check if there are any scripts that object to us respawning
579  if (!allowed) // Will be rechecked on next Update call
580  break;
581 
582  ObjectGuid dbtableHighGuid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Unit>(GetEntry(), m_spawnId);
583  time_t linkedRespawntime = GetMap()->GetLinkedRespawnTime(dbtableHighGuid);
584  if (!linkedRespawntime) // Can respawn
585  Respawn();
586  else // the master is dead
587  {
588  ObjectGuid targetGuid = sObjectMgr->GetLinkedRespawnGuid(dbtableHighGuid);
589  if (targetGuid == dbtableHighGuid) // if linking self, never respawn (check delayed to next day)
590  SetRespawnTime(DAY);
591  else
592  m_respawnTime = (now > linkedRespawntime ? now : linkedRespawntime) + urand(5, MINUTE); // else copy time from master and add a little
593  SaveRespawnTime(); // also save to DB immediately
594  }
595  }
596  break;
597  }
598  case CORPSE:
599  {
600  Unit::Update(diff);
601  // deathstate changed on spells update, prevent problems
602  if (m_deathState != CORPSE)
603  break;
604 
605  if (m_groupLootTimer && lootingGroupLowGUID)
606  {
607  if (m_groupLootTimer <= diff)
608  {
609  Group* group = sGroupMgr->GetGroupByGUID(lootingGroupLowGUID);
610  if (group)
611  group->EndRoll(&loot, GetMap());
612  m_groupLootTimer = 0;
613  lootingGroupLowGUID = 0;
614  }
615  else m_groupLootTimer -= diff;
616  }
617  else if (m_corpseRemoveTime <= time(nullptr))
618  {
619  RemoveCorpse(false);
620  LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Removing corpse... %u ", GetUInt32Value(OBJECT_FIELD_ENTRY));
621  }
622  break;
623  }
624  case ALIVE:
625  {
626  Unit::Update(diff);
627 
628  // creature can be dead after Unit::Update call
629  // CORPSE/DEAD state will processed at next tick (in other case death timer will be updated unexpectedly)
630  if (!IsAlive())
631  break;
632 
633  // if creature is charmed, switch to charmed AI
634  if (NeedChangeAI)
635  {
636  UpdateCharmAI();
637  NeedChangeAI = false;
638  IsAIEnabled = true;
639 
640  // xinef: update combat state, if npc is not in combat - return to spawn correctly by calling EnterEvadeMode
641  SelectVictim();
642  }
643 
644  Unit* owner = GetCharmerOrOwner();
645  if (IsCharmed() && !IsWithinDistInMap(owner, GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange(), true, false))
646  {
647  RemoveCharmAuras();
648  }
649 
650  if (Unit *victim = GetVictim())
651  {
652  // If we are closer than 50% of the combat reach we are going to reposition the victim
653  if (diff >= m_moveBackwardsMovementTime)
654  {
655  float MaxRange = GetCollisionRadius() + GetVictim()->GetCollisionRadius();
656 
657  if (IsInDist(victim, MaxRange))
658  AI()->MoveBackwardsChecks();
659 
660  m_moveBackwardsMovementTime = urand(MOVE_BACKWARDS_CHECK_INTERVAL, MOVE_BACKWARDS_CHECK_INTERVAL * 3);
661  }
662  else
663  {
664  m_moveBackwardsMovementTime -= diff;
665  }
666 
667  // Circling the target
668  if (diff >= m_moveCircleMovementTime)
669  {
670  AI()->MoveCircleChecks();
671  m_moveCircleMovementTime = urand(MOVE_CIRCLE_CHECK_INTERVAL, MOVE_CIRCLE_CHECK_INTERVAL * 2);
672  }
673  else
674  {
675  m_moveCircleMovementTime -= diff;
676  }
677  }
678 
679  // Call for assistance if not disabled
680  if (m_assistanceTimer)
681  {
682  if (m_assistanceTimer <= diff)
683  {
684  if (CanPeriodicallyCallForAssistance())
685  {
686  SetNoCallAssistance(false);
687  CallAssistance();
688  }
689  m_assistanceTimer = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_PERIOD);
690  }
691  else
692  {
693  m_assistanceTimer -= diff;
694  }
695  }
696 
697  if (!IsInEvadeMode() && IsAIEnabled)
698  {
699  // do not allow the AI to be changed during update
700  m_AI_locked = true;
701  i_AI->UpdateAI(diff);
702  m_AI_locked = false;
703  }
704 
705  // creature can be dead after UpdateAI call
706  // CORPSE/DEAD state will processed at next tick (in other case death timer will be updated unexpectedly)
707  if (!IsAlive())
708  break;
709 
710  m_regenTimer -= diff;
711  if (m_regenTimer <= 0)
712  {
713  if (!IsInEvadeMode())
714  {
715  // regenerate health if not in combat or if polymorphed)
716  if (!IsInCombat() || IsPolymorphed())
717  RegenerateHealth();
718  else if (IsNotReachableAndNeedRegen())
719  {
720  // regenerate health if cannot reach the target and the setting is set to do so.
721  // this allows to disable the health regen of raid bosses if pathfinding has issues for whatever reason
722  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_REGEN_HP_CANNOT_REACH_TARGET_IN_RAID) || !GetMap()->IsRaid())
723  {
724  RegenerateHealth();
725  LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "RegenerateHealth() enabled because Creature cannot reach the target. Detail: %s", GetDebugInfo().c_str());
726  }
727  else
728  LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "RegenerateHealth() disabled even if the Creature cannot reach the target. Detail: %s", GetDebugInfo().c_str());
729  }
730  }
731 
732  if (getPowerType() == POWER_ENERGY)
733  Regenerate(POWER_ENERGY);
734  else
735  Regenerate(POWER_MANA);
736 
737  m_regenTimer += CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL;
738  }
739 
740  if (CanNotReachTarget() && !IsInEvadeMode() && !GetMap()->IsRaid())
741  {
742  m_cannotReachTimer += diff;
743  if (IsNotReachable() && IsAIEnabled)
744  {
745  AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
746  }
747  }
748 
749  break;
750  }
751  default:
752  break;
753  }
754 
755  if (IsInWorld() && !IsDuringRemoveFromWorld())
756  {
757  // pussywizard:
758  if (GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
759  {
760  if (m_transportCheckTimer <= diff)
761  {
762  m_transportCheckTimer = 1000;
763  Transport* newTransport = GetMap()->GetTransportForPos(GetPhaseMask(), GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ(), this);
764  if (newTransport != GetTransport())
765  {
766  if (GetTransport())
767  GetTransport()->RemovePassenger(this, true);
768  if (newTransport)
769  newTransport->AddPassenger(this, true);
770  this->StopMovingOnCurrentPos();
771  //SendMovementFlagUpdate();
772  }
773  }
774  else
775  m_transportCheckTimer -= diff;
776  }
777 
778  sScriptMgr->OnCreatureUpdate(this, diff);
779  }
780 }
781 
782 bool Creature::IsFreeToMove()
783 {
784  uint32 moveFlags = m_movementInfo.GetMovementFlags();
785  // Do not reposition ourself when we are not allowed to move
786  if ((IsMovementPreventedByCasting() || isMoving() || !CanFreeMove()) &&
787  (GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() != CHASE_MOTION_TYPE ||
788  moveFlags & MOVEMENTFLAG_SPLINE_ENABLED))
789  {
790  return false;
791  }
792 
793  return true;
794 }
795 
796 void Creature::Regenerate(Powers power)
797 {
798  uint32 curValue = GetPower(power);
799  uint32 maxValue = GetMaxPower(power);
800 
801  // Xinef: implement power regeneration flag
802  if (!HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_REGENERATE_POWER) && !GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
803  return;
804 
805  if (curValue >= maxValue)
806  return;
807 
808  float addvalue = 0.0f;
809 
810  switch (power)
811  {
812  case POWER_FOCUS:
813  {
814  // For hunter pets.
815  addvalue = 24 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_FOCUS);
816  break;
817  }
818  case POWER_ENERGY:
819  {
820  // For deathknight's ghoul.
821  addvalue = 20;
822  break;
823  }
824  case POWER_MANA:
825  {
826  // Combat and any controlled creature
827  if (IsInCombat() || GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
828  {
829  if (GetEntry() == NPC_IMP || GetEntry() == NPC_WATER_ELEMENTAL_TEMP || GetEntry() == NPC_WATER_ELEMENTAL_PERM)
830  {
831  addvalue = uint32((GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT) / (IsUnderLastManaUseEffect() ? 8.0f : 5.0f) + 17.0f));
832  }
833  else if (!IsUnderLastManaUseEffect())
834  {
835  float ManaIncreaseRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_MANA);
836  float Spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
837 
838  addvalue = uint32((Spirit / 5.0f + 17.0f) * ManaIncreaseRate);
839  }
840  }
841  else
842  addvalue = maxValue / 3;
843  break;
844  }
845  default:
846  return;
847  }
848 
849  // Apply modifiers (if any).
850  AuraEffectList const& ModPowerRegenPCTAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN_PERCENT);
851  for (AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.begin(); i != ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.end(); ++i)
852  if (Powers((*i)->GetMiscValue()) == power)
853  AddPct(addvalue, (*i)->GetAmount());
854 
855  addvalue += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN, power) * (power == POWER_FOCUS ? PET_FOCUS_REGEN_INTERVAL : CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL) / (5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
856 
857  ModifyPower(power, int32(addvalue));
858 }
859 
860 void Creature::RegenerateHealth()
861 {
862  if (!isRegeneratingHealth())
863  return;
864 
865  uint32 curValue = GetHealth();
866  uint32 maxValue = GetMaxHealth();
867 
868  if (curValue >= maxValue)
869  return;
870 
871  uint32 addvalue = 0;
872 
873  // Not only pet, but any controlled creature
874  // Xinef: fix polymorph rapid regen
875  if (!GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID() || IsPolymorphed())
876  addvalue = maxValue / 3;
877  else //if (GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
878  {
879  float HealthIncreaseRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_HEALTH);
880  float Spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
881 
882  if (GetPower(POWER_MANA) > 0)
883  addvalue = uint32(Spirit * 0.25 * HealthIncreaseRate);
884  else
885  addvalue = uint32(Spirit * 0.80 * HealthIncreaseRate);
886  }
887 
888  // Apply modifiers (if any).
889  AuraEffectList const& ModPowerRegenPCTAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENT);
890  for (AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.begin(); i != ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.end(); ++i)
891  AddPct(addvalue, (*i)->GetAmount());
892 
893  addvalue += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_REGEN) * CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL / (5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
894 
895  ModifyHealth(addvalue);
896 }

898 void Creature::DoFleeToGetAssistance()
899 {
900  if (!GetVictim())
901  return;
902 
903  if (HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENTS_FLEEING))
904  return;
905 
906  float radius = sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS);
907  if (radius > 0)
908  {
909  Creature* creature = nullptr;
910 
911  Acore::NearestAssistCreatureInCreatureRangeCheck u_check(this, GetVictim(), radius);
912  Acore::CreatureLastSearcher<Acore::NearestAssistCreatureInCreatureRangeCheck> searcher(this, creature, u_check);
913 
914  Cell::VisitGridObjects(this, searcher, radius);
915 
916  SetNoSearchAssistance(true);
917  UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, false);
918 
919  if (!creature)
920  //SetFeared(true, GetVictim()->GetGUID(), 0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_DELAY));
921  //TODO: use 31365
922  SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_FLEEING);
923  else
924  GetMotionMaster()->MoveSeekAssistance(creature->GetPositionX(), creature->GetPositionY(), creature->GetPositionZ());
925  }
926 }

968 bool Creature::Create(ObjectGuid::LowType guidlow, Map* map, uint32 phaseMask, uint32 Entry, uint32 vehId, float x, float y, float z, float ang, const CreatureData* data)
969 {
970  ASSERT(map);
971  SetMap(map);
972  SetPhaseMask(phaseMask, false);
973 
974  CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
975  if (!cinfo)
976  {
977  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::Create(): creature template (guidlow: %u, entry: %u) does not exist.", guidlow, Entry);
978  return false;
979  }
980 
983  Relocate(x, y, z, ang);
984 
985  if (!IsPositionValid())
986  {
987  LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature::Create(): given coordinates for creature (guidlow %d, entry %d) are not valid (X: %f, Y: %f, Z: %f, O: %f)", guidlow, Entry, x, y, z, ang);
988  return false;
989  }
990 
991  // area/zone id is needed immediately for ZoneScript::GetCreatureEntry hook before it is known which creature template to load (no model/scale available yet)
992  PositionFullTerrainStatus terrainData;
993  GetMap()->GetFullTerrainStatusForPosition(GetPhaseMask(), GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ(), DEFAULT_COLLISION_HEIGHT, terrainData);
994  ProcessPositionDataChanged(terrainData);
995 
996  //oX = x; oY = y; dX = x; dY = y; m_moveTime = 0; m_startMove = 0;
997  if (!CreateFromProto(guidlow, Entry, vehId, data))
998  return false;
999 
1000  UpdateMovementFlags();
1001 
1002  switch (GetCreatureTemplate()->rank)
1003  {
1004  case CREATURE_ELITE_RARE:
1005  m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_RARE);
1006  break;
1007  case CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE:
1008  m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_ELITE);
1009  break;
1010  case CREATURE_ELITE_RAREELITE:
1011  m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_RAREELITE);
1012  break;
1013  case CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS:
1014  // Xinef: Reduce corpse delay for bossess outside of instance
1015  if (!GetInstanceId())
1016  m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_ELITE) * 2;
1017  else
1018  m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_WORLDBOSS);
1019  break;
1020  default:
1021  m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_NORMAL);
1022  break;
1023  }
1024 
1025  LoadCreaturesAddon();
1026 
1027  uint32 displayID = GetNativeDisplayId();
1028  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID);
1029  if (minfo && !IsTotem()) // Cancel load if no model defined or if totem
1030  {
1031  SetDisplayId(displayID);
1032  SetNativeDisplayId(displayID);
1033  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 2, minfo->gender);
1034  }
1035 
1037  m_positionZ += GetHoverHeight();
1038 
1039  LastUsedScriptID = GetScriptId();
1040 
1041  if (IsSpiritHealer() || IsSpiritGuide() || (GetCreatureTemplate()->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_GHOST_VISIBILITY))
1042  {
1043  m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1044  m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1045  }
1046  else if (cinfo->type_flags & CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_VISIBLE_TO_GHOSTS) // Xinef: Add ghost visibility for ghost units
1047  m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_ALIVE | GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1048 
1049  if (Entry == VISUAL_WAYPOINT)
1050  SetVisible(false);
1051 
1052  if (GetCreatureTemplate()->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_IGNORE_PATHFINDING)
1053  AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_PATHFINDING);
1054 
1055  return true;
1056 }

1058 bool Creature::isCanInteractWithBattleMaster(Player* player, bool msg) const
1059 {
1060  if (!IsBattleMaster())
1061  return false;

1076  SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7599, this);
1077  break;

1079  SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7642, this);
1080  break;
1081  case BATTLEGROUND_EY:
1082  case BATTLEGROUND_NA:
1083  case BATTLEGROUND_BE:
1084  case BATTLEGROUND_AA:
1085  case BATTLEGROUND_RL:
1086  case BATTLEGROUND_SA:
1087  case BATTLEGROUND_DS:
1088  case BATTLEGROUND_RV:
1089  SendGossipMenuFor(player, 10024, this);

1106 bool Creature::IsValidTrainerForPlayer(Player* player, uint32* npcFlags /*= nullptr*/) const
1107 {
1108  if (!IsTrainer())
1109  {
1110  return false;
1111  }
1112 
1113  switch (m_creatureInfo->trainer_type)
1114  {
1115  case TRAINER_TYPE_CLASS:
1116  case TRAINER_TYPE_PETS:
1117  if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_class && m_creatureInfo->trainer_class != player->getClass())
1118  {
1119  if (npcFlags)
1120  *npcFlags &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_CLASS;
1121 
1122  return false;
1123  }
1124  break;
1125  case TRAINER_TYPE_MOUNTS:
1126  if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_race && m_creatureInfo->trainer_race != player->getRace())
1127  {
1128  return false;
1129  }
1130  break;
1131  case TRAINER_TYPE_TRADESKILLS:
1132  if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_spell && !player->HasSpell(m_creatureInfo->trainer_spell))
1133  {
1134  if (npcFlags)
1135  *npcFlags &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_PROFESSION;
1136 
1137  return false;
1138  }
1139  break;
1140  default:
1141  break;
1142  }
1143 
1144  return true;
1145 }

1161 void Creature::SetLootRecipient(Unit* unit, bool withGroup)
1162 {
1163  // set the player whose group should receive the right
1164  // to loot the creature after it dies
1165  // should be set to nullptr after the loot disappears
1166 
1167  if (!unit)
1168  {
1169  m_lootRecipient.Clear();
1170  m_lootRecipientGroup = 0;
1171  RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_LOOTABLE | UNIT_DYNFLAG_TAPPED);
1172  ResetAllowedLooters();
1173  return;
1174  }
1175 
1176  Player* player = unit->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
1177  if (!player) // normal creature, no player involved
1178  return;
1179 
1180  m_lootRecipient = player->GetGUID();
1181 
1182  Map* map = GetMap();
1183  if (map && map->IsDungeon() && (isWorldBoss() || IsDungeonBoss()))
1184  {
1185  AddAllowedLooter(m_lootRecipient);
1186  }
1187 
1188  if (withGroup)
1189  {
1190  if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
1191  {
1192  m_lootRecipientGroup = group->GetGUID().GetCounter();
1193 
1194  if (map && map->IsDungeon() && (isWorldBoss() || IsDungeonBoss()))
1195  {
1196  Map::PlayerList const& PlayerList = map->GetPlayers();
1197  for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = PlayerList.begin(); i != PlayerList.end(); ++i)
1198  {
1199  if (Player* groupMember = i->GetSource())
1200  {
1201  if (groupMember->IsGameMaster() || groupMember->IsSpectator())
1202  {
1203  continue;
1204  }
1205 
1206  if (groupMember->GetGroup() == group)
1207  {
1208  AddAllowedLooter(groupMember->GetGUID());
1209  }
1210  }
1211  }
1212  }
1213  }
1214  }
1215  else
1216  m_lootRecipientGroup = 0;
1217 
1218  SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_TAPPED);
1219 }
1220 
1221 // return true if this creature is tapped by the player or by a member of his group.
1222 bool Creature::isTappedBy(Player const* player) const
1223 {
1224  if (player->GetGUID() == m_lootRecipient)
1225  return true;
1226 
1227  Group const* playerGroup = player->GetGroup();
1228  if (!playerGroup || playerGroup != GetLootRecipientGroup()) // if we dont have a group we arent the recipient
1229  return false; // if creature doesnt have group bound it means it was solo killed by someone else
1230 
1231  return true;
1232 }

1234 void Creature::SaveToDB()
1235 {

1237  // preferably after adding to map, because mapid may not be valid otherwise
1238  CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(m_spawnId);
1239  if (!data)
1240  {
1241  LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature::SaveToDB failed, cannot get creature data!");
1242  return;
1243  }
1244

1246  SaveToDB(mapId, data->spawnMask, GetPhaseMask());

1248 
1249 void Creature::SaveToDB(uint32 mapid, uint8 spawnMask, uint32 phaseMask)
1250 {
1251  // update in loaded data
1252  if (!m_spawnId)
1253  m_spawnId = sObjectMgr->GenerateCreatureSpawnId();
1254 
1255  CreatureData& data = sObjectMgr->NewOrExistCreatureData(m_spawnId);
1256 
1257  uint32 displayId = GetNativeDisplayId();
1258  uint32 npcflag = GetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS);
1259  uint32 unit_flags = GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS);
1260  uint32 dynamicflags = GetUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS);
1261 
1262  // check if it's a custom model and if not, use 0 for displayId
1263  CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1264  if (cinfo)
1265  {
1266  if (displayId == cinfo->Modelid1 || displayId == cinfo->Modelid2 ||
1267  displayId == cinfo->Modelid3 || displayId == cinfo->Modelid4)
1268  displayId = 0;
1269 
1270  if (npcflag == cinfo->npcflag)
1271  npcflag = 0;
1272 
1273  if (unit_flags == cinfo->unit_flags)
1274  unit_flags = 0;
1275 
1276  if (dynamicflags == cinfo->dynamicflags)
1277  dynamicflags = 0;
1278  }
1279 
1280  data.id = GetEntry();
1281  data.mapid = mapid;
1282  data.phaseMask = phaseMask;
1283  data.displayid = displayId;
1284  data.equipmentId = GetCurrentEquipmentId();
1285  if (!GetTransport())
1286  {
1287  data.posX = GetPositionX();
1288  data.posY = GetPositionY();
1289  data.posZ = GetPositionZ();
1290  data.orientation = GetOrientation();
1291  }
1292  else
1293  {
1294  data.posX = GetTransOffsetX();
1295  data.posY = GetTransOffsetY();
1296  data.posZ = GetTransOffsetZ();
1297  data.orientation = GetTransOffsetO();
1298  }
1299 
1300  data.spawntimesecs = m_respawnDelay;
1301  // prevent add data integrity problems
1302  data.wander_distance = GetDefaultMovementType() == IDLE_MOTION_TYPE ? 0.0f : m_wanderDistance;
1303  data.currentwaypoint = 0;
1304  data.curhealth = GetHealth();
1305  data.curmana = GetPower(POWER_MANA);
1306  // prevent add data integrity problems
1307  data.movementType = !m_wanderDistance && GetDefaultMovementType() == RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE
1308  ? IDLE_MOTION_TYPE : GetDefaultMovementType();
1309  data.spawnMask = spawnMask;
1310  data.npcflag = npcflag;
1311  data.unit_flags = unit_flags;
1312  data.dynamicflags = dynamicflags;
1313 
1314  // update in DB
1315  WorldDatabaseTransaction trans = WorldDatabase.BeginTransaction();
1316 
1317  WorldDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_DEL_CREATURE);
1318  stmt->setUInt32(0, m_spawnId);
1319  trans->Append(stmt);
1320 
1321  uint8 index = 0;
1322 
1323  stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_INS_CREATURE);
1324  stmt->setUInt32(index++, m_spawnId);
1325  stmt->setUInt32(index++, GetEntry());
1326  stmt->setUInt16(index++, uint16(mapid));
1327  stmt->setUInt8(index++, spawnMask);
1328  stmt->setUInt32(index++, GetPhaseMask());
1329  stmt->setUInt32(index++, displayId);
1330  stmt->setInt32(index++, int32(GetCurrentEquipmentId()));
1331  stmt->setFloat(index++, GetPositionX());
1332  stmt->setFloat(index++, GetPositionY());
1333  stmt->setFloat(index++, GetPositionZ());
1334  stmt->setFloat(index++, GetOrientation());
1335  stmt->setUInt32(index++, m_respawnDelay);
1336  stmt->setFloat(index++, m_wanderDistance);
1337  stmt->setUInt32(index++, 0);
1338  stmt->setUInt32(index++, GetHealth());
1339  stmt->setUInt32(index++, GetPower(POWER_MANA));
1340  stmt->setUInt8(index++, uint8(GetDefaultMovementType()));
1341  stmt->setUInt32(index++, npcflag);
1342  stmt->setUInt32(index++, unit_flags);
1343  stmt->setUInt32(index++, dynamicflags);
1344  trans->Append(stmt);
1345 
1346  WorldDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
1347 }

1349 void Creature::SelectLevel(bool changelevel)
1350 {
1351  CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1352 
1353  uint32 rank = IsPet() ? 0 : cInfo->rank;
1354 
1355  // level
1356  uint8 minlevel = std::min(cInfo->maxlevel, cInfo->minlevel);
1357  uint8 maxlevel = std::max(cInfo->maxlevel, cInfo->minlevel);
1358  uint8 level = minlevel == maxlevel ? minlevel : urand(minlevel, maxlevel);
1359  if (changelevel)
1360  SetLevel(level);
1361 
1362  CreatureBaseStats const* stats = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureBaseStats(level, cInfo->unit_class);
1363 
1364  // health
1365  float healthmod = _GetHealthMod(rank);
1366 
1367  uint32 basehp = std::max<uint32>(1, stats->GenerateHealth(cInfo));
1368  uint32 health = uint32(basehp * healthmod);
1369 
1370  SetCreateHealth(health);
1371  SetMaxHealth(health);
1372  SetHealth(health);
1373  ResetPlayerDamageReq();
1374 
1375  // mana
1376  uint32 mana = stats->GenerateMana(cInfo);
1377 
1378  SetCreateMana(mana);
1379  SetMaxPower(POWER_MANA, mana); //MAX Mana
1380  SetPower(POWER_MANA, mana);
1381 
1382  // TODO: set UNIT_FIELD_POWER*, for some creature class case (energy, etc)
1383 
1384  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, BASE_VALUE, (float)health);
1385  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_MANA, BASE_VALUE, (float)mana);
1386 
1387  // damage
1388 
1389  float basedamage = stats->GenerateBaseDamage(cInfo);
1390 
1391  float weaponBaseMinDamage = basedamage;
1392  float weaponBaseMaxDamage = basedamage * 1.5;
1393 
1394  SetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE, weaponBaseMinDamage);
1395  SetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE, weaponBaseMaxDamage);
1396 
1397  SetBaseWeaponDamage(OFF_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE, weaponBaseMinDamage);
1398  SetBaseWeaponDamage(OFF_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE, weaponBaseMaxDamage);
1399 
1400  SetBaseWeaponDamage(RANGED_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE, weaponBaseMinDamage);
1401  SetBaseWeaponDamage(RANGED_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE, weaponBaseMaxDamage);
1402 
1403  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER, BASE_VALUE, stats->AttackPower);
1404  SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED, BASE_VALUE, stats->RangedAttackPower);
1405 
1406  sScriptMgr->Creature_SelectLevel(cInfo, this);
1407 }

1466 bool Creature::CreateFromProto(ObjectGuid::LowType guidlow, uint32 Entry, uint32 vehId, const CreatureData* data)
1467 {
1468  SetZoneScript();
1469  if (GetZoneScript() && data)
1470  {
1471  Entry = GetZoneScript()->GetCreatureEntry(guidlow, data);
1472  if (!Entry)
1473  return false;
1474  }
1475 
1476  CreatureTemplate const* normalInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
1477  if (!normalInfo)
1478  {
1479  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::CreateFromProto(): creature template (guidlow: %u, entry: %u) does not exist.", guidlow, Entry);
1480  return false;
1481  }
1482 
1483  SetOriginalEntry(Entry);
1484 
1485  Object::_Create(guidlow, Entry, (vehId || normalInfo->VehicleId) ? HighGuid::Vehicle : HighGuid::Unit);
1486 
1487  // Xinef: select proper vehicle id
1488  if (!vehId)
1489  {
1490  CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = normalInfo;
1491  for (uint8 diff = uint8(GetMap()->GetSpawnMode()); diff > 0 && !IsPet();)
1492  {
1493  // we already have valid Map pointer for current creature!
1494  if (cinfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1])
1495  {
1496  cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1]);
1497  if (cinfo && cinfo->VehicleId)
1498  break; // template found
1499 
1500  // check and reported at startup, so just ignore (restore normalInfo)
1501  cinfo = normalInfo;
1502  }
1503 
1504  // for instances heroic to normal, other cases attempt to retrieve previous difficulty
1505  if (diff >= RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_HEROIC && GetMap()->IsRaid())
1506  diff -= 2; // to normal raid difficulty cases
1507  else
1508  --diff;
1509  }
1510 
1511  if (cinfo->VehicleId)
1512  CreateVehicleKit(cinfo->VehicleId, (cinfo->VehicleId != normalInfo->VehicleId ? cinfo->Entry : normalInfo->Entry));
1513  }
1514  else
1515  CreateVehicleKit(vehId, Entry);
1516 
1517  if (!UpdateEntry(Entry, data))
1518  return false;
1519 
1520  return true;
1521 }

1528 bool Creature::LoadCreatureFromDB(ObjectGuid::LowType spawnId, Map* map, bool addToMap, bool gridLoad, bool allowDuplicate /*= false*/)
1529 {
1530  if (!allowDuplicate)
1531  {
1532  // If an alive instance of this spawnId is already found, skip creation
1533  // If only dead instance(s) exist, despawn them and spawn a new (maybe also dead) version
1534  const auto creatureBounds = map->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().equal_range(spawnId);
1535  std::vector <Creature*> despawnList;
1536 
1537  if (creatureBounds.first != creatureBounds.second)
1538  {
1539  for (auto itr = creatureBounds.first; itr != creatureBounds.second; ++itr)
1540  {
1541  if (itr->second->IsAlive())
1542  {
1543  LOG_DEBUG("maps", "Would have spawned %u but %s already exists", spawnId, creatureBounds.first->second->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
1544  return false;
1545  }
1546  else
1547  {
1548  despawnList.push_back(itr->second);
1549  LOG_DEBUG("maps", "Despawned dead instance of spawn %u (%s)", spawnId, itr->second->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
1550  }
1551  }
1552 
1553  for (Creature* despawnCreature : despawnList)
1554  {
1555  despawnCreature->AddObjectToRemoveList();
1556  }
1557  }
1558  }
1559 
1560  CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(spawnId);
1561  if (!data)
1562  {
1563  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (SpawnId: %u) not found in table `creature`, can't load. ", spawnId);
1564  return false;
1565  }
1566 
1567  // xinef: fix shitness from db
1568  if ((addToMap || gridLoad) && !data->overwrittenZ)
1569  {
1570  float tz = map->GetHeight(data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ + 1.0f, true);
1571  if (tz >= data->posZ && tz - data->posZ <= 1.0f)
1572  const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->posZ = tz + 0.1f;
1573 
1574  const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->overwrittenZ = true;
1575  }
1576 
1577  // xinef: this has to be assigned before Create function, properly loads equipment id from DB
1578  m_creatureData = data;
1579  m_spawnId = spawnId;
1580 
1581  if (!Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::Unit>(), map, data->phaseMask, data->id, 0, data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, data->orientation, data))
1582  return false;
1583 
1584  //We should set first home position, because then AI calls home movement
1585  SetHomePosition(data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, data->orientation);
1586 
1587  m_wanderDistance = data->wander_distance;
1588 
1589  m_respawnDelay = data->spawntimesecs;
1590  m_deathState = ALIVE;
1591 
1592  m_respawnTime = GetMap()->GetCreatureRespawnTime(m_spawnId);
1593  if (m_respawnTime) // respawn on Update
1594  {
1595  m_deathState = DEAD;
1596  if (CanFly())
1597  {
1598  float tz = map->GetHeight(GetPhaseMask(), data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, true, MAX_FALL_DISTANCE);
1599  if (data->posZ - tz > 0.1f && Acore::IsValidMapCoord(tz))
1600  {
1601  Relocate(data->posX, data->posY, tz);
1602  }
1603  }
1604  }
1605 
1606  uint32 curhealth;
1607 
1608  if (!m_regenHealth)
1609  {
1610  curhealth = data->curhealth;
1611  if (curhealth)
1612  {
1613  curhealth = uint32(curhealth * _GetHealthMod(GetCreatureTemplate()->rank));
1614  if (curhealth < 1)
1615  curhealth = 1;
1616  }
1617  SetPower(POWER_MANA, data->curmana);
1618  }
1619  else
1620  {
1621  curhealth = GetMaxHealth();
1622  SetPower(POWER_MANA, GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
1623  }
1624 
1625  SetHealth(m_deathState == ALIVE ? curhealth : 0);
1626 
1627  // checked at creature_template loading
1628  m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(data->movementType);
1629 
1630  if (addToMap && !GetMap()->AddToMap(this))
1631  return false;
1632  return true;
1633 }

1736 bool Creature::CanStartAttack(Unit const* who) const
1737 {
1738  if (IsCivilian())
1739  return false;
1740 
1741  // This set of checks is should be done only for creatures
1742  if ((HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC) && who->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) || // flag is valid only for non player characters
1743  (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC) && who->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)) // immune to PC and target is a player, return false
1744  {
1745  return false;
1746  }
1747 
1748  if (Unit* owner = who->GetOwner())
1749  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC)) // immune to PC and target has player owner
1750  return false;
1751 
1752  // Do not attack non-combat pets
1753  if (who->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && who->GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_NON_COMBAT_PET)
1754  return false;
1755 
1756  if (!CanFly() && (GetDistanceZ(who) > CREATURE_Z_ATTACK_RANGE + m_CombatDistance)) // too much Z difference, skip very costy vmap calculations here
1757  return false;
1758 
1759  if (!_IsTargetAcceptable(who))
1760  return false;
1761 
1762  // pussywizard: at this point we are either hostile to who or friendly to who->getAttackerForHelper()
1763  // pussywizard: if who is in combat and has an attacker, help him if the distance is right (help because who is hostile or help because attacker is friendly)
1764  bool assist = false;
1765  if (who->IsInCombat() && IsWithinDist(who, ATTACK_DISTANCE))
1766  if (Unit* victim = who->getAttackerForHelper())
1767  if (IsWithinDistInMap(victim, sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS)))
1768  assist = true;
1769 
1770  if (!assist)
1771  if (IsNeutralToAll() || !IsWithinDistInMap(who, GetAggroRange(who) + m_CombatDistance, true, false)) // pussywizard: +m_combatDistance for turrets and similar
1772  return false;
1773 
1774  if (!CanCreatureAttack(who))
1775  return false;
1776 
1777  if (HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_STUNNED))
1778  return false;
1779 
1780  return IsWithinLOSInMap(who);
1781 }
1782 
1783 void Creature::setDeathState(DeathState s, bool despawn)
1784 {
1785  Unit::setDeathState(s, despawn);
1786 
1787  if (s == JUST_DIED)
1788  {
1789  _lastDamagedTime.reset();
1790 
1791  m_corpseRemoveTime = time(nullptr) + m_corpseDelay;
1792  m_respawnTime = time(nullptr) + m_respawnDelay + m_corpseDelay;
1793 
1794  // always save boss respawn time at death to prevent crash cheating
1795  if (GetMap()->IsDungeon() || isWorldBoss() || GetCreatureTemplate()->rank >= CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE)
1796  SaveRespawnTime();
1797 
1798  SetTarget(); // remove target selection in any cases (can be set at aura remove in Unit::setDeathState)
1799  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_NONE);
1800 
1801  Dismount(); // if creature is mounted on a virtual mount, remove it at death
1802 
1803  setActive(false);
1804 
1805  if (!IsPet() && GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId)
1806  if (LootTemplates_Skinning.HaveLootFor(GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId))
1807  if (hasLootRecipient())
1808  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE);
1809 
1810  if (HasSearchedAssistance())
1811  {
1812  SetNoSearchAssistance(false);
1813  }
1814 
1815  //Dismiss group if is leader
1816  if (m_formation && m_formation->getLeader() == this)
1817  m_formation->FormationReset(true, false);
1818 
1819  bool needsFalling = !despawn && (IsFlying() || IsHovering()) && !IsUnderWater();
1820  SetHover(false);
1821  SetDisableGravity(false);
1822 
1823  if (needsFalling)
1824  GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall(0, true);
1825 
1826  Unit::setDeathState(CORPSE, despawn);
1827  }
1828  else if (s == JUST_RESPAWNED)
1829  {
1830  //if (IsPet())
1831  // setActive(true);
1832  SetFullHealth();
1833  SetLootRecipient(nullptr);
1834  ResetPlayerDamageReq();
1835  SetCannotReachTarget(false);
1836  CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1837  // Xinef: npc run by default
1838  //SetWalk(true);
1839 
1840  // pussywizard:
1841  if (HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING))
1842  RemoveUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING);
1843 
1844  UpdateMovementFlags();
1845 
1846  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, cinfo->npcflag);
1847  ClearUnitState(uint32(UNIT_STATE_ALL_STATE & ~(UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_PATHFINDING | UNIT_STATE_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPD)));
1848  SetMeleeDamageSchool(SpellSchools(cinfo->dmgschool));
1849

1851

1853  LoadCreaturesAddon(true);
1854  if (GetCreatureData() && GetPhaseMask() != GetCreatureData()->phaseMask)
1855  SetPhaseMask(GetCreatureData()->phaseMask, false);
1856  }

1859 void Creature::Respawn(bool force)
1860 {
1861  //DestroyForNearbyPlayers(); // pussywizard: not needed
1862 
1863  if (force)
1864  {
1865  if (IsAlive())
1866  setDeathState(JUST_DIED);
1867  else if (getDeathState() != CORPSE)
1868  setDeathState(CORPSE);
1869  }
1870 
1871  RemoveCorpse(false, false);
1872 
1873  if (getDeathState() == DEAD)
1874  {
1875  if (m_spawnId)
1876  GetMap()->RemoveCreatureRespawnTime(m_spawnId);
1877 
1878  LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Respawning creature %s (SpawnId: %u, %s)", GetName().c_str(), GetSpawnId(), GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
1879  m_respawnTime = 0;
1880  ResetPickPocketLootTime();
1881 
1882  if (m_originalEntry != GetEntry())
1883  UpdateEntry(m_originalEntry);
1884 
1885  SelectLevel();
1886 
1887  setDeathState(JUST_RESPAWNED);
1888 
1889  uint32 displayID = GetNativeDisplayId();
1890  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID);
1891  if (minfo) // Cancel load if no model defined
1892  {
1893  SetDisplayId(displayID);
1894  SetNativeDisplayId(displayID);
1895  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 2, minfo->gender);
1896  }
1897 
1898  GetMotionMaster()->InitDefault();
1899 
1900  //Call AI respawn virtual function
1901  if (IsAIEnabled)
1902  {
1903  //reset the AI to be sure no dirty or uninitialized values will be used till next tick
1904  AI()->Reset();
1905  TriggerJustRespawned = true;//delay event to next tick so all creatures are created on the map before processing
1906  }
1907 
1908  uint32 poolid = m_spawnId ? sPoolMgr->IsPartOfAPool<Creature>(m_spawnId) : 0;
1909  if (poolid)
1910  sPoolMgr->UpdatePool<Creature>(poolid, m_spawnId);
1911 
1912  //Re-initialize reactstate that could be altered by movementgenerators
1913  InitializeReactState();
1914 
1915  m_respawnedTime = sWorld->GetGameTime();
1916  }
1917  m_respawnedTime = time(nullptr);
1918  // xinef: relocate notifier, fixes npc appearing in corpse position after forced respawn (instead of spawn)
1919  m_last_notify_position.Relocate(-5000.0f, -5000.0f, -5000.0f, 0.0f);
1920  UpdateObjectVisibility(false);
1921 }

1998 void Creature::LoadSpellTemplateImmunity()
1999 {
2000  // uint32 max used for "spell id", the immunity system will not perform SpellInfo checks against invalid spells
2001  // used so we know which immunities were loaded from template
2002  static uint32 const placeholderSpellId = std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max();
2003 
2004  // unapply template immunities (in case we're updating entry)
2005  for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i <= SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE; ++i)
2006  {
2007  ApplySpellImmune(placeholderSpellId, IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, i, false);
2008  }
2009 
2010  // don't inherit immunities for hunter pets
2011  if (GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() && IsHunterPet())
2012  {
2013  return;
2014  }
2015 
2016  if (uint8 mask = GetCreatureTemplate()->SpellSchoolImmuneMask)
2017  {
2018  for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i <= SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE; ++i)
2019  {
2020  if (mask & (1 << i))
2021  {
2022  ApplySpellImmune(placeholderSpellId, IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, 1 << i, true);
2023  }
2024  }
2025  }
2026 }

2028 bool Creature::IsImmunedToSpell(SpellInfo const* spellInfo)
2029 {
2030  if (!spellInfo)
2031  return false;
2032 
2033  // Xinef: this should exclude self casts...
2034  // Spells that don't have effectMechanics.
2035  if (spellInfo->Mechanic > MECHANIC_NONE && HasMechanicTemplateImmunity(1 << (spellInfo->Mechanic - 1)))
2036  return true;
2037 
2038  // This check must be done instead of 'if (GetCreatureTemplate()->MechanicImmuneMask & (1 << (spellInfo->Mechanic - 1)))' for not break
2039  // the check of mechanic immunity on DB (tested) because GetCreatureTemplate()->MechanicImmuneMask and m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC] don't have same data.
2040  bool immunedToAllEffects = true;
2041  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2042  if (spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect() && !IsImmunedToSpellEffect(spellInfo, i))
2043  {
2044  immunedToAllEffects = false;
2045  break;
2046  }
2047  if (immunedToAllEffects)
2048  return true;
2049 
2050  return Unit::IsImmunedToSpell(spellInfo);
2051 }
2052 
2053 bool Creature::IsImmunedToSpellEffect(SpellInfo const* spellInfo, uint32 index) const
2054 {
2055  // Xinef: this should exclude self casts...
2056  if (spellInfo->Effects[index].Mechanic > MECHANIC_NONE && HasMechanicTemplateImmunity(1 << (spellInfo->Effects[index].Mechanic - 1)))
2057  return true;
2058 
2059  if (GetCreatureTemplate()->type == CREATURE_TYPE_MECHANICAL && spellInfo->Effects[index].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL)
2060  return true;
2061 
2062  return Unit::IsImmunedToSpellEffect(spellInfo, index);
2063 }

2065 SpellInfo const* Creature::reachWithSpellAttack(Unit* victim)
2066 {
2067  if (!victim)
2068  return nullptr;
2069 
2070  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
2071  {
2072  if (!m_spells[i])
2073  continue;
2074  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spells[i]);
2075  if (!spellInfo)
2076  {
2077  LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "WORLD: unknown spell id %i", m_spells[i]);
2078  continue;
2079  }
2080 
2081  bool bcontinue = true;
2082  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; j++)
2083  {
2084  if ((spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE) ||
2085  (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTAKILL) ||
2086  (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_ENVIRONMENTAL_DAMAGE) ||
2087  (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH)
2088  )
2089  {
2090  bcontinue = false;
2091  break;
2092  }
2093  }
2094  if (bcontinue)
2095  continue;
2096 
2097  if (spellInfo->ManaCost > GetPower(POWER_MANA))
2098  continue;
2099  float range = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(false);
2100  float minrange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(false);
2101  float dist = GetDistance(victim);
2102  if (dist > range || dist < minrange)
2103  continue;
2104  if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE && HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
2105  continue;
2106  if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY && HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED))
2107  continue;
2108  return spellInfo;
2109  }
2110  return nullptr;
2111 }

2204 void Creature::CallAssistance(Unit* target /*= nullptr*/)
2205 {
2206  if (!target)
2207  {
2208  target = GetVictim();
2209  }
2210 
2211  if (!m_AlreadyCallAssistance && target && !IsPet() && !IsCharmed())
2212  {
2213  SetNoCallAssistance(true);
2214 
2215  float radius = sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS);
2216 
2217  if (radius > 0)
2218  {
2219  std::list<Creature*> assistList;
2220 
2221  Acore::AnyAssistCreatureInRangeCheck u_check(this, target, radius);
2222  Acore::CreatureListSearcher<Acore::AnyAssistCreatureInRangeCheck> searcher(this, assistList, u_check);
2223  Cell::VisitGridObjects(this, searcher, radius);
2224 
2225  if (!assistList.empty())
2226  {
2227  AssistDelayEvent* e = new AssistDelayEvent(target->GetGUID(), this);
2228  while (!assistList.empty())
2229  {
2230  // Pushing guids because in delay can happen some creature gets despawned => invalid pointer
2231  e->AddAssistant((*assistList.begin())->GetGUID());
2232  assistList.pop_front();
2233  }
2234  m_Events.AddEvent(e, m_Events.CalculateTime(sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_DELAY)));
2235  }
2236  }
2237  }
2238 }

2251 bool Creature::CanAssistTo(const Unit* u, const Unit* enemy, bool checkfaction /*= true*/) const
2252 {
2253  // is it true?
2254  if (!HasReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE))
2255  return false;
2256 
2257  // we don't need help from zombies :)
2258  if (!IsAlive())
2259  return false;
2260 
2261  // Xinef: we cannot assist in evade mode
2262  if (IsInEvadeMode())
2263  return false;
2264 
2265  // pussywizard: or if enemy is in evade mode
2266  if (enemy->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && enemy->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
2267  return false;
2268 
2269  // we don't need help from non-combatant ;)
2270  if (IsCivilian())
2271  return false;
2272 
2273  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE | UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC))
2274  return false;
2275 
2276  // skip fighting creature
2277  if (IsInCombat())
2278  return false;
2279 
2280  // only free creature
2281  if (GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
2282  return false;
2283 
2284  // only from same creature faction
2285  if (checkfaction)
2286  {
2287  if (GetFaction() != u->GetFaction())
2288  return false;
2289  }
2290  else
2291  {
2292  if (!IsFriendlyTo(u))
2293  return false;
2294  }
2295 
2296  // skip non hostile to caster enemy creatures
2297  if (!IsHostileTo(enemy))
2298  return false;
2299 
2300  // Check if can see the enemy
2301  if (!CanSeeOrDetect(enemy))
2302  {
2303  return false;
2304  }
2305 
2306  return true;
2307 }

2309 // use this function to avoid having hostile creatures attack
2310 // friendlies and other mobs they shouldn't attack
2311 bool Creature::_IsTargetAcceptable(const Unit* target) const
2312 {
2313  ASSERT(target);
2314 
2315  // if the target cannot be attacked, the target is not acceptable
2316  if (IsFriendlyTo(target) || !target->isTargetableForAttack(false, this) || (m_vehicle && (IsOnVehicle(target) || m_vehicle->GetBase()->IsOnVehicle(target))))
2317  return false;
2318 
2319  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_DIED))
2320  {
2321  // some creatures can detect fake death
2322  if (CanIgnoreFeignDeath() && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH))
2323  return true;
2324  else
2325  return false;
2326  }
2327 
2328  const Unit* myVictim = getAttackerForHelper();
2329  const Unit* targetVictim = target->getAttackerForHelper();
2330 
2331  // if I'm already fighting target, or I'm hostile towards the target, the target is acceptable
2332  if (myVictim == target || targetVictim == this || IsHostileTo(target))
2333  return true;
2334 
2335  // if the target's victim is friendly, and the target is neutral, the target is acceptable
2336  if (targetVictim && !IsNeutralToAll() && IsFriendlyTo(targetVictim))
2337  return true;
2338 
2339  // if the target's victim is not friendly, or the target is friendly, the target is not acceptable
2340  return false;
2341 }

2364  m_moveInLineOfSightStrictlyDisabled = true;
2365  return;

2371  nonHostile = false;

2387 bool Creature::CanCreatureAttack(Unit const* victim, bool skipDistCheck) const
2388 {
2389  if (!victim->IsInMap(this))
2390  return false;
2391 
2392  if (!IsValidAttackTarget(victim))
2393  return false;
2394 
2395  if (!victim->isInAccessiblePlaceFor(this))
2396  return false;
2397 
2398  if (IsAIEnabled && !AI()->CanAIAttack(victim))
2399  return false;
2400 
2401  // pussywizard: we cannot attack in evade mode
2402  if (IsInEvadeMode())
2403  return false;
2404 
2405  // pussywizard: or if enemy is in evade mode
2406  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && victim->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
2407  return false;
2408 
2409  // cannot attack if is during 5 second grace period, unless being attacked
2410  if (m_respawnedTime && (sWorld->GetGameTime() - m_respawnedTime) < 5 && victim->getAttackers().empty())
2411  {
2412  return false;
2413  }
2414 
2415  if (!GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
2416  {
2417  if (GetMap()->IsDungeon())
2418  return true;
2419 
2420  // pussywizard: don't check distance to home position if recently damaged (allow kiting away from spawnpoint!)
2421  // xinef: this should include taunt auras
2422  if (!isWorldBoss() && (GetLastDamagedTime() > sWorld->GetGameTime() || HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT)))
2423  return true;
2424  }
2425 
2426  if (skipDistCheck)
2427  return true;
2428 
2429  // xinef: added size factor for huge npcs
2430  float dist = std::min<float>(GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange() + GetObjectSize() * 2, 150.0f);
2431 
2432  if (Unit* unit = GetCharmerOrOwner())
2433  return victim->IsWithinDist(unit, dist);
2434  else
2435  {
2436  // to prevent creatures in air ignore attacks because distance is already too high...
2437  if (GetCreatureTemplate()->InhabitType & INHABIT_AIR)
2438  return victim->IsInDist2d(&m_homePosition, dist);
2439  else
2440  return victim->IsInDist(&m_homePosition, dist);
2441  }
2442 }

2456 //creature_addon table
2457 bool Creature::LoadCreaturesAddon(bool reload)
2458 {
2459  CreatureAddon const* cainfo = GetCreatureAddon();
2460  if (!cainfo)
2461  return false;
2462 
2463  if (cainfo->mount != 0)
2464  Mount(cainfo->mount);
2465 
2466  if (cainfo->bytes1 != 0)
2467  {
2468  // 0 StandState
2469  // 1 FreeTalentPoints Pet only, so always 0 for default creature
2470  // 2 StandFlags
2471  // 3 StandMiscFlags
2472 
2473  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_STAND_STATE, uint8(cainfo->bytes1 & 0xFF));
2474  //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_TALENTS, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 8) & 0xFF));
2475  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_TALENTS, 0);
2476  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_VIS_FLAG, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 16) & 0xFF));
2477  m_originalAnimTier = uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 24) & 0xFF);
2478  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_ANIM_TIER, m_originalAnimTier);
2479 
2485  if (GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, 3) & UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_HOVER /*&& !(GetCreatureTemplate()->InhabitType & INHABIT_AIR)*/)
2486  AddUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_HOVER);
2487  }
2488 
2489  if (cainfo->bytes2 != 0)
2490  {
2491  // 0 SheathState
2492  // 1 Bytes2Flags
2493  // 2 UnitRename Pet only, so always 0 for default creature
2494  // 3 ShapeshiftForm Must be determined/set by shapeshift spell/aura
2495 
2496  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 0, uint8(cainfo->bytes2 & 0xFF));
2497  //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 8) & 0xFF));
2498  //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 16) & 0xFF));
2499  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2, 0);
2500  //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 3, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 24) & 0xFF));
2501  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 3, 0);
2502  }
2503 
2504  // Check if Creature is Large
2505  if (cainfo->isLarge)
2506  SetVisibilityDistanceOverride(true);
2507 
2508  if (cainfo->emote != 0)
2509  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, cainfo->emote);
2510 
2511  //Load Path
2512  if (cainfo->path_id != 0)
2513  {
2514  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_SET_ALL_CREATURES_WITH_WAYPOINT_MOVEMENT_ACTIVE))
2515  setActive(true);
2516  m_path_id = cainfo->path_id;
2517  }
2518 
2519  if (!cainfo->auras.empty())
2520  {
2521  for (std::vector<uint32>::const_iterator itr = cainfo->auras.begin(); itr != cainfo->auras.end(); ++itr)
2522  {
2523  SpellInfo const* AdditionalSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(*itr);
2524  if (!AdditionalSpellInfo)
2525  {
2526  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (%s) has wrong spell %u defined in `auras` field.", GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), *itr);
2527  continue;
2528  }
2529 
2530  // skip already applied aura
2531  if (HasAura(*itr))
2532  {
2533  if (!reload)
2534  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (%s) has duplicate aura (spell %u) in `auras` field.", GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), *itr);
2535 
2536  continue;
2537  }
2538 
2539  AddAura(*itr, this);
2540  LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Spell: %u added to creature (%s)", *itr, GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
2541  }
2542  }
2543 
2544  return true;
2545 }

2568 bool Creature::IsSpellProhibited(SpellSchoolMask idSchoolMask) const
2569 {

2575  if (idSchoolMask & (1 << i))

2590 void Creature::AddSpellCooldown(uint32 spell_id, uint32 /*itemid*/, uint32 end_time, bool /*needSendToClient*/, bool /*forceSendToSpectator*/)
2591 {
2592  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell_id);
2593  if (!spellInfo)
2594  return;
2595 
2596  // used in proc system, otherwise normal creature cooldown
2597  if (end_time)
2598  {
2599  _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id, 0, end_time);
2600  return;
2601  }
2602 
2603  uint32 spellcooldown = spellInfo->RecoveryTime;
2604  uint32 categoryId = spellInfo->GetCategory();
2605  uint32 categorycooldown = categoryId ? spellInfo->CategoryRecoveryTime : 0;
2606  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
2607  {
2608  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COOLDOWN, spellcooldown);
2609  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COOLDOWN, categorycooldown);
2610  }
2611 
2612  SpellCategoryStore::const_iterator i_scstore = sSpellsByCategoryStore.find(categoryId);
2613  if (categorycooldown && i_scstore != sSpellsByCategoryStore.end())
2614  {
2615  for (SpellCategorySet::const_iterator i_scset = i_scstore->second.begin(); i_scset != i_scstore->second.end(); ++i_scset)
2616  {
2617  _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(i_scset->second, categoryId, categorycooldown);
2618  }
2619  }
2620  else if (spellcooldown)
2621  {
2622  _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id, 0, spellcooldown);
2623  }
2624 }
2625 
2626 uint32 Creature::GetSpellCooldown(uint32 spell_id) const
2627 {
2628  CreatureSpellCooldowns::const_iterator itr = m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.find(spell_id);
2629  if (itr == m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.end())
2630  return 0;
2631 
2632  return itr->second.end > World::GetGameTimeMS() ? itr->second.end - World::GetGameTimeMS() : 0;
2633 }
2634 
2635 bool Creature::HasSpellCooldown(uint32 spell_id) const

2660 void Creature::GetRespawnPosition(float& x, float& y, float& z, float* ori, float* dist) const
2661 {
2662  if (m_spawnId)
2663  {
2664  if (CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(m_spawnId))
2665  {
2666  x = data->posX;
2667  y = data->posY;
2668  z = data->posZ;
2669  if (ori)
2670  *ori = data->orientation;
2671  if (dist)
2672  *dist = data->wander_distance;
2673 
2674  return;
2675  }
2676  }
2677 
2678  // xinef: changed this from current position to home position, fixes world summons with infinite duration
2679  if (GetTransport())
2680  {
2681  x = GetPositionX();
2682  y = GetPositionY();
2683  z = GetPositionZ();
2684  if (ori)
2685  *ori = GetOrientation();
2686  }
2687  else
2688  {
2689  Position homePos = GetHomePosition();
2690  x = homePos.GetPositionX();
2691  y = homePos.GetPositionY();
2692  z = homePos.GetPositionZ();
2693  if (ori)
2694  *ori = homePos.GetOrientation();
2695  }
2696  if (dist)
2697  *dist = 0;
2698 }

2700 void Creature::AllLootRemovedFromCorpse()
2701 {
2702  if (!HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE))
2703  {
2704  time_t now = time(nullptr);
2705  if (m_corpseRemoveTime <= now)
2706  return;
2707 
2708  float decayRate;
2709  CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
2710 
2711  decayRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CORPSE_DECAY_LOOTED);
2712  uint32 diff = uint32((m_corpseRemoveTime - now) * decayRate);
2713 
2714  m_respawnTime -= diff;
2715 
2716  // corpse skinnable, but without skinning flag, and then skinned, corpse will despawn next update
2717  if (cinfo && cinfo->SkinLootId)
2718  m_corpseRemoveTime = time(nullptr);
2719  else
2720  m_corpseRemoveTime -= diff;
2721  }
2722 }

2730  if (level < 1)
2731  return 1;
2732  if (level > 255)
2733  return 255;
2734  return uint8(level);
2735 }

2760 uint32 Creature::GetVendorItemCurrentCount(VendorItem const* vItem)
2761 {
2762  if (!vItem->maxcount)
2763  return vItem->maxcount;
2764 
2765  VendorItemCounts::iterator itr = m_vendorItemCounts.begin();
2766  for (; itr != m_vendorItemCounts.end(); ++itr)
2767  if (itr->itemId == vItem->item)
2768  break;
2769 
2770  if (itr == m_vendorItemCounts.end())
2771  return vItem->maxcount;
2772 
2773  VendorItemCount* vCount = &*itr;
2774 
2775  time_t ptime = time(nullptr);
2776 
2777  if (time_t(vCount->lastIncrementTime + vItem->incrtime) <= ptime)
2778  {
2779  ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(vItem->item);
2780 
2781  uint32 diff = uint32((ptime - vCount->lastIncrementTime) / vItem->incrtime);
2782  if ((vCount->count + diff * pProto->BuyCount) >= vItem->maxcount)
2783  {
2784  m_vendorItemCounts.erase(itr);
2785  return vItem->maxcount;
2786  }
2787 
2788  vCount->count += diff * pProto->BuyCount;
2789  vCount->lastIncrementTime = ptime;
2790  }
2791 
2792  return vCount->count;
2793 }
2794 
2795 uint32 Creature::UpdateVendorItemCurrentCount(VendorItem const* vItem, uint32 used_count)
2796 {
2797  if (!vItem->maxcount)
2798  return 0;
2799 
2800  VendorItemCounts::iterator itr = m_vendorItemCounts.begin();
2801  for (; itr != m_vendorItemCounts.end(); ++itr)
2802  if (itr->itemId == vItem->item)
2803  break;
2804 
2805  if (itr == m_vendorItemCounts.end())
2806  {
2807  uint32 new_count = vItem->maxcount > used_count ? vItem->maxcount - used_count : 0;
2808  m_vendorItemCounts.push_back(VendorItemCount(vItem->item, new_count));
2809  return new_count;
2810  }
2811 
2812  VendorItemCount* vCount = &*itr;
2813 
2814  time_t ptime = time(nullptr);
2815 
2816  if (time_t(vCount->lastIncrementTime + vItem->incrtime) <= ptime)
2817  {
2818  ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(vItem->item);
2819 
2820  uint32 diff = uint32((ptime - vCount->lastIncrementTime) / vItem->incrtime);
2821  if ((vCount->count + diff * pProto->BuyCount) < vItem->maxcount)
2822  vCount->count += diff * pProto->BuyCount;
2823  else
2824  vCount->count = vItem->maxcount;
2825  }
2826 
2827  vCount->count = vCount->count > used_count ? vCount->count - used_count : 0;
2828  vCount->lastIncrementTime = ptime;
2829  return vCount->count;
2830 }

3119 float Creature::GetAggroRange(Unit const* target) const
3120 {
3121  // Determines the aggro range for creatures
3122  // Based on data from wowwiki due to lack of 3.3.5a data
3123 
3124  float aggroRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
3125  if (aggroRate == 0)
3126  return 0.0f;
3127 
3128  auto creatureLevel = target->getLevelForTarget(this);
3129  auto playerLevel = getLevelForTarget(target);
3130  int32 levelDiff = int32(creatureLevel) - int32(playerLevel);
3131 
3132  // The maximum Aggro Radius is capped at 45 yards (25 level difference)
3133  if (levelDiff < -25)
3134  levelDiff = -25;
3135 
3136  // The base aggro radius for mob of same level
3137  auto aggroRadius = GetDetectionRange();
3138  if (aggroRadius < 1)
3139  {
3140  return 0.0f;
3141  }
3142  // Aggro Radius varies with level difference at a rate of roughly 1 yard/level
3143  aggroRadius -= (float)levelDiff;
3144 
3145  // detect range auras
3146  aggroRadius += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE);
3147 
3148  // detected range auras
3149  aggroRadius += target->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE);
3150 
3151  // Just in case, we don't want pets running all over the map
3152  if (aggroRadius > MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS)
3153  aggroRadius = MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS;
3154 
3155  // Minimum Aggro Radius for a mob seems to be combat range (5 yards)
3156  // hunter pets seem to ignore minimum aggro radius so we'll default it a little higher
3157  float minRange = IsPet() ? 10.0f : 5.0f;
3158  if (aggroRadius < minRange)
3159  aggroRadius = minRange;
3160 
3161  return (aggroRadius * aggroRate);
3162 }
3163 
3164 void Creature::UpdateMovementFlags()
3165 {
3166  // Do not update movement flags if creature is controlled by a player (charm/vehicle)
3167  if (m_movedByPlayer)
3168  return;
3169 
3170  CreatureTemplate const* info = GetCreatureTemplate();
3171  if (!info)
3172  return;
3173 
3174  // Creatures with CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_MOVE_FLAGS_UPDATE should control MovementFlags in your own scripts
3175  if (info->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_MOVE_FLAGS_UPDATE)
3176  return;
3177 
3178  float z = GetPositionZ();
3179  float ground = GetFloorZ();
3180 
3181  bool isInAir = false;
3182  bool Swim = false;
3183 
3184  bool canHover = CanHover();
3185 
3186  LiquidData const& liquidData = GetLiquidData();
3187  if (liquidData.Status == LIQUID_MAP_NO_WATER)
3188  {
3189  if (ground > INVALID_HEIGHT)
3190  isInAir = G3D::fuzzyGt(z, ground + (canHover ? GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_HOVERHEIGHT) : 0.0f) + GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE) || G3D::fuzzyLt(z, ground - GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE); // Can be underground too, prevent the falling
3191  else
3192  isInAir = true;
3193  }
3194  else
3195  {
3196  switch (liquidData.Status)
3197  {
3198  case LIQUID_MAP_ABOVE_WATER:
3199  isInAir = true;
3200  break;
3201  case LIQUID_MAP_WATER_WALK:
3202  isInAir = true;
3203  [[fallthrough]];
3204  case LIQUID_MAP_IN_WATER:
3205  Swim = z - liquidData.DepthLevel > GetCollisionHeight() * 0.75f; // Shallow water at ~75% of collision height
3206  break;
3207  case LIQUID_MAP_UNDER_WATER:
3208  Swim = true;
3209  break;
3210  default:
3211  break;
3212  }
3213  }
3214 
3215  SetSwim(CanSwim() && Swim);
3216 
3217  if (info->InhabitType & INHABIT_AIR)
3218  {
3219  if (isInAir && !IsFalling())
3220  {
3221  if (info->InhabitType & INHABIT_GROUND)
3222  {
3223  SetCanFly(true);
3224  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_ANIM_TIER, UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_FLY);
3225  }
3226  else
3227  SetDisableGravity(true);
3228 
3229  if (!HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_HOVER))
3230  SetHover(false);
3231  }
3232  else
3233  {
3234  SetCanFly(false);
3235  SetDisableGravity(false);
3236 
3237  if (info->InhabitType & INHABIT_GROUND)
3238  {
3239  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_ANIM_TIER, UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_GROUND);
3240  }
3241 
3242  if (IsAlive() && (CanHover() || HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_HOVER)))
3243  SetHover(true);
3244  }
3245  }
3246  else if (!HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_CAN_FLY | MOVEMENTFLAG_DISABLE_GRAVITY) && IsAlive() && (CanHover() || HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_HOVER)))
3247  SetHover(true);
3248 }

3339 float Creature::GetAttackDistance(Unit const* player) const
3340 {
3341  float aggroRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
3342 
3343  if (aggroRate == 0)
3344  return 0.0f;
3345 
3346  if (!player)
3347  return 0.0f;
3348 
3349  uint32 playerLevel = player->getLevelForTarget(this);
3350  uint32 creatureLevel = getLevelForTarget(player);
3351 
3352  int32 levelDiff = static_cast<int32>(playerLevel) - static_cast<int32>(creatureLevel);
3353 
3354  // "The maximum Aggro Radius has a cap of 25 levels under. Example: A level 30 char has the same Aggro Radius of a level 5 char on a level 60 mob."
3355  if (levelDiff < -25)
3356  levelDiff = -25;
3357 
3358  // "The aggro radius of a mob having the same level as the player is roughly 20 yards"
3359  float retDistance = 20.0f;
3360 
3361  // "Aggro Radius varies with level difference at a rate of roughly 1 yard/level"
3362  // radius grow if playlevel < creaturelevel
3363  retDistance -= static_cast<float>(levelDiff);
3364 
3365  if (creatureLevel + 5 <= sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL))
3366  {
3367  // detect range auras
3368  retDistance += static_cast<float>( GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE) );
3369 
3370  // detected range auras
3371  retDistance += static_cast<float>( player->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE) );
3372  }
3373 
3374  // "Minimum Aggro Radius for a mob seems to be combat range (5 yards)"
3375  if (retDistance < 5.0f)
3376  retDistance = 5.0f;
3377 
3378  return (retDistance * aggroRate);
3379 }

3381 bool Creature::IsMovementPreventedByCasting() const
3382 {
3383  Spell* spell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL];
3384  // first check if currently a movement allowed channel is active and we're not casting
3385  if (spell && spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED && spell->IsChannelActive() && spell->GetSpellInfo()->IsMoveAllowedChannel())
3386  {
3387  return false;
3388  }
3389 
3390  if (HasSpellFocus())
3391  {
3392  return true;
3393  }
3394 
3395  if (HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
3396  {
3397  return true;
3398  }
3399 
3400  return false;
3401 }
